snippet: Asian stocks touched their highest levels in nearly three years on Monday, basking in the glow of a record close on Wall Street after bright U.S. jobs data pointed to improving economic momentum....

headline.print_headline: Asia Stocks Push to Nearly Three-Year High, Dollar Edges Up
headline.main: Asia Stocks Push to Nearly Three-Year High, Dollar Edges Up

lead_paragraph: Asian stocks touched their highest levels in nearly three years on Monday, basking in the glow of a record close on Wall Street after bright U.S. jobs data pointed to improving economic momentum.
